texts.name: Christian
texts.biography: Christian was always more of a frontiersman than a Knight, having set foot in nearly every part of Enroth before finally settling into military service in Erathia. Though a wanderer and a bit of dreamer, his battefield tactics are feared throughout the world.

specialty.description:
{Ballista}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Ballista by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Ballista
